title: Elden Ring Is the Best Game We've Never Played | The Escapist Show
description:
Yes, it's satire. This week on The Escapist Show, Nick and Jack discuss the games we've been playing and get very hyped for Elden Ring. 

Note: Sorry about the out of focus camera!
